verses.t: And{G1161} he spake{G3004} a parable{G3850} unto them{G846} to this end, that men ought{G1163} always{G3842} to pray{G4336}, and{G2532} not{G3361} to faint{G1573};
Saying{G3004}, There was{G2258} in{G1722} a{G5100} city{G4172} a judge{G2923}, which{G5100} feared{G5399} not{G3361} God{G3588}, neither{G3361} regarded{G1788} man{G444}:

And{G1161} there was{G2258} a widow{G5503} in{G1722} that{G1565} city{G3588}; and{G2532} she came{G2064} unto{G4314} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, Avenge{G1556} me{G3165} of{G575} mine{G3450} adversary{G3588}.

And{G2532} he would{G2309} not{G3756} for{G1909} a while{G5550}: but{G1161} afterward{G3326} he said{G2036} within{G1722} himself{G1438}, Though{G1487} I fear{G5399} not{G3756} God{G3588}, nor{G3756} regard{G1788} man{G444};

Yet{G1065} because{G1223} this{G3778} widow{G3588} troubleth{G3930} me{G3427}, I will avenge{G1556} her{G846}, lest{G3361} by{G1519} her{G2064} continual{G5056} coming{G2064} she weary{G5299} me{G3165}.
And{G1161} the Lord{G3588} said{G2036}, Hear{G191} what{G5101} the unjust{G3588} judge{G3588} saith{G3004}.

And{G1161} shall{G4160} not{G3361} God{G2316} avenge{G3588} his own{G846} elect{G1588}, which{G3588} cry{G994} day{G2250} and{G2532} night{G3571} unto{G4314} him{G846}, though{G2532} he bear long{G3114} with{G1909} them{G846}?UNSURE: Since ekdikeisis is the direct object of the verb poieo, would be of course "Do vengence" so I left it to reflect for those who really are looking, to see His active willinginess to avenge His elect.

I tell{G3004} you{G5213} that{G3754} he will{G4160} avenge{G3588} them{G846} speedily{G5034}. Nevertheless when{G4133} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} cometh{G2064}, shall{G687} he find{G2147} faith{G3588} on{G1909} the earth{G3588}?NOTE: The same verbal construction as in verse 7 (poieo+accusative)..

And{G1161} he spake{G2036} this{G3778} parable{G3588} unto{G4314} certain{G5100} which{G3588} trusted{G3982} in{G1909} themselves{G1438} that{G3754} they were{G1526} righteous{G1342}, and{G2532} despised{G1848} others{G3062}:
Two{G1417} men{G444} went up{G305} into{G1519} the temple{G3588} to pray{G4336}; the one{G1520} a Pharisee{G5330}, and{G2532} the other{G2087} a publican{G5057}.

The Pharisee{G3588} stood{G2476} and prayed{G4336} thus{G5023} with{G4314} himself{G1438}God{G3588}, I thank{G2168} thee{G4671}, that{G3754} I am{G1510} not{G3756} as{G5618} other{G3062} men{G3588} are, extortioners{G727}, unjust{G94}, adulterers{G3432}, or{G2228} even{G2532} as{G5613} this{G3778} publican{G3588}.
I fast{G3522} twice{G1364} in the week{G3588}, I give tithes{G586} of all{G3956} that{G3745} I possess{G2932}.

And{G2532} the publican{G3588}, standing{G2476} afar off{G3113}, would{G2309} not{G3756} lift up{G1869} so much as{G3761} his eyes{G3588} unto{G1519} heaven{G3588}, but{G235} smote{G5180} upon{G1519} his{G846} breast{G3588}, saying{G3004}, God{G3588} be merciful{G2433} to me{G3427} a sinner{G268}.

I tell{G3004} you{G5213}, this man{G3778} went down{G2597} to{G1519} his{G846} house{G3588} justified{G1344} rather than{G2228} the other{G1565}: for{G3754} every one{G3956} that{G3588} exalteth{G5312} himself{G1438} shall be abased{G5013}; and{G1161} he that{G3588} humbleth{G5013} himself{G1438} shall be exalted{G5312}.

And{G1161} they brought{G4374} unto him{G846} also{G2532} infants{G3588}, that{G2443} he would touch{G680} them{G846}: but when{G1161} his disciples{G3588} saw{G1492} it, they rebuked{G2008} them{G846}.

But{G1161} Jesus{G2424} called{G4341} them{G846} unto him, and said{G2036}, Suffer{G863} little children{G3588} to come{G2064} unto{G4314} me{G3165}, and{G2532} forbid{G2967} them{G846} not{G3361}: for{G1063} of such{G5108} is{G2076} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}.

Verily{G281} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, Whosoever{G3739} shall{G1209} not{G3361} receive{G1209} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} as{G5613} a little child{G3813} shall{G1525} in{G3756} no wise{G3361} enter{G1525} therein{G846}.

And{G2532} a certain{G5100} ruler{G758} asked{G1905} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, Good{G18} Master{G1320}, what{G5101} shall I do{G4160} to inherit{G2816} eternal{G166} life{G2222}?NOTE: There is an extra tag of "kleironomeo" here.
And{G1161} Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Why{G5101} callest thou{G3004} me{G3165} good{G18}? none{G3762} is good{G18}, save{G1487} one{G1520}, that is, God{G3588}.

Thou knowest{G1492} the commandments{G3588}, Do{G3431} not{G3361} commit adultery{G3431}, Do{G5407} not{G3361} kill{G5407}, Do{G2813} not{G3361} steal{G2813}, Do{G5576} not{G3361} bear false witness{G5576}, Honour{G5091} thy{G4675} father{G3588} and{G2532} thy{G4675} mother{G3588}.
And{G1161} he said{G2036}, All{G3956} these{G5023} have I kept{G5442} from{G1537} my{G3450} youth up{G3503}.

Now when{G1161} Jesus{G3588} heard{G191} these things{G5023}, he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Yet{G2089} lackest{G3007} thou{G4671} one thing{G1520}: sell{G4453} all{G3956} that{G3745} thou hast{G2192}, and{G2532} distribute{G1239} unto the poor{G4434}, and{G2532} thou shalt have{G2192} treasure{G2344} in{G1722} heaven{G3772}: and{G2532} come{G1204}, follow{G190} me{G3427}.
And when{G1161} he heard{G191} this{G5023}, he was{G1096} very sorrowful{G4036}: for{G1063} he was{G2258} very{G4970} rich{G4145}.

And when{G1161} Jesus{G3588} saw that{G1492} he{G846} was{G1096} very sorrowful{G4036}, he said{G2036}, How{G4459} hardly{G1423} shall{G1525} they that{G3588} have{G2192} riches{G3588} enter{G1525} into{G1519} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}!

For{G1063} it is{G2076} easier for{G2123} a camel{G2574} to go{G1525} through{G1223} a needle's{G4476} eye{G5168}, than for{G2228} a rich man{G4145} to enter{G1525} into{G1519} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588}.
And{G1161} they that{G3588} heard{G191} it said{G2036}, Who{G5101} then{G2532} can{G1410} be saved{G4982}?
And{G1161} he said{G2036}, The things which{G3588} are{G2076} impossible{G102} with{G3844} men{G444} are possible{G1415} with{G3844} God{G3588}.
Then{G1161} Peter{G3588} said{G2036}, Lo{G2400}, we{G2249} have left{G863} all{G3956}, and{G2532} followed{G190} thee{G4671}.

And{G1161} he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Verily{G281} I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, There is{G2076} no man{G3762} that{G3739} hath left{G863} house{G3614}, or{G2228} parents{G1118}, or{G2228} brethren{G80}, or{G2228} wife{G1135}, or{G2228} children{G5043}, for{G1752} the kingdom{G3588} of God's{G3588} sake{G1752},UNSURE: Tagging of "hoti"
Who{G3739} shall{G618} not{G3361} receive{G618} manifold more{G4179} in{G1722} this{G5129} present time{G3588}, and{G2532} in{G1722} the world{G3588} to come{G2064} life{G2222} everlasting{G166}.

Then{G1161} he took{G3880} unto him the twelve{G1427}, and said{G2036} unto{G4314} them{G846}, Behold{G2400}, we go up{G305} to{G1519} Jerusalem{G2414}, and{G2532} all things{G3956} that are{G3588} written{G1125} by{G1223} the prophets{G3588} concerning the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} shall be accomplished{G5055}.
For{G1063} he shall be delivered{G3860} unto the Gentiles{G3588}, and{G2532} shall be mocked{G1702}, and{G2532} spitefully entreated{G5195}, and{G2532} spitted on{G1716}:
And{G2532} they shall scourge{G3146} him, and put{G615} him{G846} to death{G615}: and{G2532} the third{G5154} day{G3588} he shall rise again{G450}.

And{G2532} they{G846} understood{G4920} none{G3762} of these things{G5130}: and{G2532} this{G5124} saying{G3588} was{G2258} hid{G2928} from{G575} them{G846}, neither{G3756} knew they{G1097} the things which{G3588} were spoken{G3004}.
And{G1161} it came to pass{G1096}, that as{G1722} he{G846} was come nigh{G1448} unto{G1519} Jericho{G2410}, a certain{G5100} blind man{G5185} sat{G2521} by{G3844} the way side{G3588} begging{G4319}:
And{G1161} hearing{G191} the multitude{G3793} pass by{G1279}, he asked{G4441} what{G5101} it{G5124} meant{G1498}.
And{G1161} they told{G518} him{G846}, that{G3754} Jesus{G2424} of Nazareth{G3588} passeth by{G3928}.
And{G2532} he cried{G994}, saying{G3004}, Jesus{G2424}, thou Son{G5207} of David{G1138}, have mercy{G1653} on me{G3165}.

And{G2532} they which{G3588} went before{G4254} rebuked{G2008} him{G846}, that{G2443} he should hold{G4623} his{G846} peace{G4623}: but{G1161} he cried{G2896} so much{G4183} the more{G3123}, Thou Son{G5207} of David{G1138}, have mercy{G1653} on me{G3165}.
And{G1161} Jesus{G3588} stood{G2476}, and commanded{G2753} him{G846} to be brought{G71} unto{G4314} him{G846}: and when{G1161} he{G846} was come near{G1448}, he asked{G1905} him{G846},
Saying{G3004}, What{G5101} wilt thou{G2309} that I shall do{G4160} unto thee{G4671}? And{G1161} he said{G2036}, Lord{G2962}, that{G2443} I may receive my sight{G308}.
And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Receive thy sight{G308}: thy{G4675} faith{G3588} hath saved{G4982} thee{G4571}.

And{G2532} immediately{G3916} he received his sight{G308}, and{G2532} followed{G190} him{G846}, glorifying{G1392} God{G3588}: and{G2532} all{G3956} the people{G3588}, when they saw{G1492} it, gave{G1325} praise{G136} unto God{G3588}.
